      • getImg

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImg(GameObject g,
                                           int i)
        Should take a Game Object and a image number and return the relevent image. If no image is found, it calls this.addImageToArray(g)
        Parameters:
        g - The Game Object
        i - The expected number location
        Returns:
        Returns a buffered image.

      • addImage

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage addImage(GameObject g,
                                              int i)
        Adds the GameObject and new ArrayList to the Hashtable if it was added after initTable was called. NOTE: This adds the image to the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        g - GameObject to add the image of
        i - The location in the array that was tried.
        Returns:
        Returns the newly created image

      • addImageToArray

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage addImageToArray(GameObject g)
        Adds an image (typicaly a new scaled version of it) to the ArrayList associated to the Hashtabele NOTE: This adds the image to the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        g - GameObject to add the image of
        Returns:
        The new image
